RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread

RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread Class Reference

#include <serverthread.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Encapsulates a EnetServer in a Qt thread.

A signal emitted when a client request a connection.
